profile.description: User's profile information containing detailed details.

always_active.description: Indicates if the user is always active.

avatar_hash.description: Hash value representing the user's avatar.

real_name.description: Full real name of the user.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

real_name_normalized.description: Normalized full real name of the user.

display_name_normalized.description: Normalized display name of the user.

fields.description: Custom fields associated with the user.

image_original.description: URL of the user's original image.

status_emoji_display_info.description: Information related to the display of status emoji.

items.description: Individual items for status emoji display info.

status_expiration.description: Expiration date for the user's status.

status_text_canonical.description: Canonical text representing the user's status.

team_id.description: Unique identifier for the team the user belongs to.

deleted.description: Indicates if the user is deleted or not.

color.description: The color assigned to the user for visual purposes.

real_name.description: The real name of the user.

tz_label.description: Label representing the timezone of the user.

is_admin.description: Flag specifying if the user is an admin or not.

is_owner.description: Flag indicating if the user is an owner.

is_primary_owner.description: Specifies if the user is the primary owner.

is_restricted.description: Flag specifying if the user is restricted.

is_ultra_restricted.description: Indicates if the user has ultra-restricted access.

is_bot.description: Indicates if the user is a bot account.

is_forgotten.description: Specifies if the user is marked as forgotten.

is_invited_user.description: Indicates if the user is invited or not.

is_email_confirmed.description: Flag indicating if the user's email is confirmed.

updated.description: Timestamp of when the user's information was last updated.

who_can_share_contact_card.description: Specifies who can share the user's contact card.

is_app_user.description: Specifies if the user is an app user.

has_2fa.description: Flag indicating if the user has two-factor authentication enabled.
